channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Niger investigating $5 million sale of largest Mars rock
item.description: A 54-pound meteorite from Mars has sold for over $5 million at a New York auction, setting a world record

item.title: 3 dead in shooting at Target in Austin, suspect detained: Police
item.description: Three people are dead following a shooting at a Target store in Austin, Texas, according to police.

item.title: Sec. McMahon kicks off tour promoting state-led education
item.description: Education Secretary Linda McMahon is touring the country to promote state-led education plans.

item.description: President Donald Trump announced that he is placing the D.C. Metropolitan Police Department under federal control and deploying the National Guard "to...

item.title: WATCH: Derek Hough's new baby may be following in his footsteps
item.description: The "Dancing with the Stars" pro joined "GMA" to discuss becoming a dad.

item.title: Trial starts over Trump administration’s deployment of National Guard to Los Angeles
Paramount acquires UFC rights in 7-year deal with TKO Group
item.description: Paramount will become the new home to all UFC events in the U.S., while UFC's CEO says the White House may host a July 4 event broadcast on CBS.

item.title: WATCH: One dead, 10 injured in explosion at Pennsylvania steel plant, officials say
item.description: One person has died, one is unaccounted for and 10 are injured following an explosion at a Pennsylvania steel plant on Monday, local police said.

item.title: Tropical Storm Erin forms, could become Atlantic's first hurricane this season
item.description: Tropical Storm Erin was expected to become a hurricane later in the week.

item.title: 3 dead, suspect in custody after shooting at Target in Austin
item.description: Three people were killed and a suspect was arrested after a shooting at a Target store parking lot in North Austin, police said.
